mapper.sql: topid, title, picpath, subtitle, topupdatetime, t_content, onlooks, joinnums, creattime, updatetime, t_audit, ispass, isdelete, t_sort
mapper.select:
select * from dd_topic where
title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and
isdelete=1 order by creattime desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(0) from dd_topic where
title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and
isdelete=1
mapper.insert: insert into dd_topic (topid, title, picpath, subtitle, topupdatetime, t_content, onlooks, joinnums, creattime, updatetime, t_audit, ispass, isdelete, t_sort) values (#{topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topupdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{t_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlooks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{joinnums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{t_audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{t_sort,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update dd_topic
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picpath = #{picpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topupdatetime = #{topupdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_content = #{t_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

joinnums = #{joinnums,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ispass = #{ispass,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_sort = #{t_sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where topid = #{topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
